title: Gamification-Enhanced Cognitive Learning Strategy Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education experience and understanding of job-specific applications
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented educational design emphasizing gamification tools tailored to mobile environments and learner engagement strategies.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze gamification elements based on cognitive load theory.
Learners can design three game mechanics applicable to language learning projects.
Learners can develop evaluation protocols using smartphone-based gamification tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
